Package com.xebisco.yield

Class ChangeSceneTransition

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.ChangeSceneTransition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable
public abstract class ChangeSceneTransition extends Object implements Renderable
The abstract class ChangeSceneTransition contains methods for managing time and frames in a scene transition effect.
